ygData.subject: intro
ygData.msgSnippet: I currently am starting over on the Drinal Server b/c I have friends that are there. All my friends left the Veeshan server or quit playing EQ. So my Level 15
ygData.messageBody:
I currently am starting over on the Drinal Server
b/c I have friends that are there. All my friends
left the Veeshan server or quit playing EQ. So my
Level 15 Warrior and Level 14 druid there are just
going to have to wait.<br><br>In the mean time, I
currently have a Lvl 5 Iskar Monk and Level 4 WE Druid (my
fave! But I'm bad at collecting cash and forever short
on spells and equip). Drinal server is proving
interesting.<br><br>The only bad thing is, any time I settle down to play
two or three hours, RL interferes!
Curses!!!<br><br>Take care all,<br>shooman, fatedhue (Iskars are fun!
Druids rule!)
